name: Yewno Finance API
description: Knowledge discovery and analytics platform providing concept-driven search and document analysis for financial research using AI-powered semantic analysis.

access_info.pricing_model: Free trial available, contact for enterprise pricing

endpoints.description: Search for concepts with definitions and metadata
endpoints.response_format: JSON with concept definitions and relationships

endpoints.description: Search for documents by concepts or topics
endpoints.response_format: JSON with document metadata and relevance scores

research_notes.api_summary: Yewno provides AI-powered knowledge discovery through concept-driven search and document analysis, with public API documentation available on GitHub and registration required for access.

name: Estimize Data API
description: Crowdsourced earnings estimates platform providing EPS and revenue estimates from 120,000+ contributors, 70% more accurate than Wall Street estimates for 3000+ US listed companies.

access_info.pricing_model: Free trial available, institutional licensing for full access

endpoints.description: Get EPS and revenue estimates for companies
endpoints.response_format: JSON with consensus and individual estimates

content_summary.geographic_scope: US listed companies and ADRs, 27 US and 55 international economic metrics

research_notes.api_summary: Estimize provides crowdsourced earnings estimates from 120,000+ contributors with 70% better accuracy than Wall Street estimates, covering 3000+ US companies with historical data back to January 2012.

name: Sentifi API (Discontinued)
description: Former social sentiment analysis platform for financial markets. Service has been discontinued or merged with other providers. Alternative providers include SentiCrypt, Utradea, and StockTwits.

research_notes.api_summary: Sentifi service has been discontinued. Alternative providers include SentiCrypt for crypto sentiment, Utradea for social sentiment API, and StockTwits Firestream for real-time social sentiment streams.

name: TagniFi API (formerly TickerTags)
description: Financial data platform providing point-in-time financial statement data with as-reported transparency, industry-specific templates, and comprehensive market data.

endpoints.description: Financial statement data with point-in-time capabilities
endpoints.response_format: JSON with financial statement data

endpoints.description: End-of-day market prices and trading data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with market price data

research_notes.api_summary: TagniFi provides point-in-time financial statement data with as-reported transparency and industry-specific templates, featuring HTTP Basic Auth and comprehensive market data coverage.

name: Sentieo Research Platform API
description: AI-powered research platform for institutional investors providing document search, earnings call analysis, and enterprise research workflows for 900+ global institutional clients.

endpoints.description: AI-powered document search and analysis
endpoints.response_format: JSON with document search results and analysis

endpoints.description: Earnings call transcript analysis with Smart Summary
endpoints.response_format: JSON with earnings call analysis and summaries

research_notes.api_summary: Sentieo serves 900+ global institutional clients with AI-powered research platform featuring document search, earnings call analysis, and cloud integrations for investment analysts and portfolio managers.

name: MKT MediaStats API
description: AI-driven narrative analysis of media and behavioral data for investment insights, providing global market coverage including stocks, FX, fixed income, and crypto with enterprise-only access.

endpoints.description: AI-driven narrative analysis of media and behavioral data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with narrative insights and behavioral indicators

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global markets including stocks, FX, fixed income, crypto

research_notes.api_summary: MKT MediaStats provides AI-driven narrative analysis for institutional clients with no public API documentation found. Requires direct vendor contact for access and integration details.

name: FinBrain Technologies API
description: AI-powered stock predictions and sentiment analysis platform providing technical indicators, earnings analysis, and risk signals for 10,000+ global stocks with Python SDK available.

endpoints.description: AI-powered stock price predictions with confidence scores
endpoints.response_format: JSON with prediction values and confidence metrics

endpoints.description: Sentiment analysis and social media indicators
endpoints.response_format: JSON with sentiment scores and social indicators

content_summary.update_frequency: Multiple timeframes with extensive historical data

research_notes.api_summary: FinBrain provides AI-powered stock predictions with comprehensive documentation, Python SDK availability, and clear pricing structure covering 10,000+ global stocks with multiple prediction timeframes.

name: Prattle Analytics API (Discontinued)
description: Former central bank communication sentiment analysis platform. Service discontinued as independent offering after acquisition by Liquidnet in 2019. Access only through Liquidnet platform for institutional clients.

access_info.pricing_model: Service discontinued - access only through Liquidnet platform

content_summary.geographic_scope: Formerly covered 15 central banks, 3,000+ US companies

research_notes.api_summary: Prattle Analytics was acquired by Liquidnet in 2019 and is no longer available as independent API service. Former services included central bank communication sentiment analysis covering 15 central banks and 3,000+ US companies.

name: Geoquant API (Identity Unclear)
description: No specific company named 'Geoquant' clearly identified. Multiple geospatial API providers offer similar services including climate risk data, geocoding, and spatial analysis. Requires clarification of specific company and requirements.

research_notes.api_summary: No specific company named 'Geoquant' clearly identified. Multiple geospatial API providers exist with similar services. Need clarification of specific company and requirements for accurate API documentation.

name: PredictIt API
description: Political prediction markets API providing real-time data on election betting, current events, and political forecasting with free access and no authentication required.

access_info.pricing_model: Completely free with no authentication required

endpoints.description: All available prediction markets with current prices
endpoints.response_format: JSON with all markets and contract prices

endpoints.description: Specific market data by market ID
endpoints.response_format: JSON with specific market details and contracts

endpoints.description: Market data by ticker symbol
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ticker-specific market data

content_summary.geographic_scope: Primarily US political events with some international coverage

research_notes.api_summary: PredictIt offers completely free API access to political prediction markets with no authentication required. Well-documented with multiple client libraries available and immediate integration capability.

name: Google Trends API
description: Search trend data and market research insights. Official API in Alpha requires application, but multiple third-party alternatives available including SerpApi and HasData for immediate access.

access_info.pricing_model: Official API: Alpha access. Third-party: SerpApi $75-275/month, HasData $49-249/month
access_info.rate_limits: Varies by provider - third-party options have clear rate limits

endpoints.description: Search trends data with geographic and temporal filtering
endpoints.response_format: JSON with trend data and related queries

research_notes.api_summary: Google Trends official API in Alpha with application required. Best immediate access through SerpApi ($75-275/month) or HasData ($49-249/month) with comprehensive documentation and free tiers available.

documentation.examples: Multiple examples provided by third-party providers

name: Advan Research API
description: Location intelligence platform providing 300 billion monthly location data points and 500 million transactions covering 7,000+ companies across 300 sectors with enterprise-only access.

endpoints.description: Foot traffic analytics and location intelligence
endpoints.response_format: JSON with foot traffic metrics and trends

endpoints.description: Transaction data and consumer spending patterns
endpoints.response_format: JSON with transaction volumes and spending analytics

content_summary.geographic_scope: 300 billion monthly location data points, 7,000+ companies across 300 sectors

research_notes.api_summary: Advan Research provides 300 billion monthly location data points and 500 million transactions with enterprise-only access covering 7,000+ companies across 300 sectors for location intelligence and foot traffic analytics.

name: YipitData API
description: Alternative financial data platform covering 2,000+ companies with 40+ datasets and 2M e-receipt panelists, focusing on investment research and earnings prediction with enterprise access.

endpoints.description: Access to 40+ alternative datasets covering various sectors
endpoints.response_format: JSON with dataset-specific metrics and trends

endpoints.description: E-receipt data from 2M panelists for consumer spending analysis
endpoints.response_format: JSON with receipt data and spending patterns

research_notes.api_summary: YipitData provides alternative financial data covering 2,000+ companies with 40+ datasets and 2M e-receipt panelists, focusing on investment research and earnings prediction with custom enterprise pricing.

name: Exante Data API
description: Global macroeconomic and sovereign risk data platform providing comprehensive economic indicators, risk assessments, and market intelligence with subscription-based access and GitHub code examples.

endpoints.description: Global macroeconomic indicators and time series data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with economic indicator values and metadata

endpoints.description: Sovereign risk assessments and country risk ratings
endpoints.response_format: JSON with risk ratings and assessment details

research_notes.api_summary: Exante Data provides global macroeconomic and sovereign risk data with comprehensive API documentation available and GitHub repository with code examples for subscription-based access.

name: CoreLogic API (now Cotality)
description: Comprehensive real estate data platform with 5.5 billion US property records spanning 50 years, providing 99.9% market coverage with analytics and property intelligence APIs.

endpoints.description: Search property records and get detailed property information
endpoints.response_format: JSON with comprehensive property details

endpoints.description: Market analytics and trend data for geographic regions
endpoints.response_format: JSON with market analytics and trends

content_summary.geographic_scope: 5.5 billion US property records, 99.9% market coverage, 50 years of data

research_notes.api_summary: CoreLogic (now Cotality) provides comprehensive real estate data with 5.5 billion US property records spanning 50 years and 99.9% market coverage, with median pricing around $12,000/year varying by features.

name: S&P Global Market Intelligence API
description: Comprehensive financial and ESG data platform providing fundamental data, as-reported indicators, and ESG metrics with enterprise-only access and custom pricing based on data requirements.

access_info.pricing_model: Enterprise-only with custom pricing based on data volume and requirements

endpoints.description: Comprehensive fundamental data and as-reported indicators
endpoints.response_format: JSON with fundamental financial data

endpoints.description: ESG metrics and sustainability indicators
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG scores and metrics

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global coverage with comprehensive market data

research_notes.api_summary: S&P Global Market Intelligence provides comprehensive financial and ESG data platform with enterprise-only access, covering fundamental data, as-reported indicators, and ESG metrics with custom pricing.

name: ESG Book API
description: Automated ESG data collection and sustainability reporting platform with strong focus on emissions estimation covering 45,000+ companies and consent-based data access for financial institutions.

access_info.pricing_model: Contact for pricing - financial institution focus

endpoints.description: Comprehensive ESG data for specific companies
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG metrics and sustainability data

endpoints.description: Automated emissions estimation for companies
endpoints.response_format: JSON with emissions estimates and methodology

content_summary.update_frequency: Automated data collection with regular updates

research_notes.api_summary: ESG Book specializes in automated ESG data collection and sustainability reporting with emissions estimation for 45,000+ companies, featuring consent-based data access designed for financial institutions.

name: MSCI ESG API
description: Industry-leading ESG ratings platform with AAA to CCC scale covering 17,000+ issuers and 999,000+ securities, backed by 25+ years of ESG expertise and methodology.

endpoints.description: ESG ratings on AAA to CCC scale for issuers and securities
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG ratings and methodology details

endpoints.description: Detailed ESG research and analysis reports
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG research and analysis

research_notes.api_summary: MSCI provides industry-leading ESG ratings with AAA to CCC scale covering 17,000+ issuers and 999,000+ securities, backed by 25+ years of ESG expertise and comprehensive methodology.

name: Sustainalytics ESG Assessment Platform (EAP) API
description: Comprehensive ESG risk ratings and research platform with two-phase authentication system, owned by Morningstar with extensive documentation available on GitHub.

endpoints.description: ESG risk ratings and assessment data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG risk ratings and detailed assessments

endpoints.description: Comprehensive ESG research and analysis
endpoints.response_format: JSON with detailed ESG research reports

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global coverage with comprehensive company database

research_notes.api_summary: Sustainalytics, owned by Morningstar, provides comprehensive ESG risk ratings and research with two-phase authentication system and extensive documentation available on GitHub for enterprise clients.

name: RepRisk API
description: AI-powered reputational risk intelligence platform combining AI with expert human analysis, focusing on due diligence and compliance use cases for enterprise clients.

endpoints.description: AI-powered reputational risk assessments with human expert analysis
endpoints.response_format: JSON with risk scores and detailed analysis

endpoints.description: Compliance screening and due diligence analysis
endpoints.response_format: JSON with compliance screening results

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global coverage with AI and human analysis
content_summary.update_frequency: Continuous AI monitoring with human validation

research_notes.api_summary: RepRisk provides AI-powered reputational risk intelligence combining automated AI analysis with expert human validation, focusing on due diligence and compliance use cases with restricted client-only documentation access.

name: HouseCanary API
description: Comprehensive residential real estate analytics platform with machine learning-based valuations, providing excellent API design, Python SDK, and test API keys for development.

access_info.pricing_model: Test API keys for development, subscription-based for production

endpoints.description: Machine learning-based property valuations and analytics
endpoints.response_format: JSON with property value estimates and confidence scores

endpoints.description: Comprehensive property details and characteristics
endpoints.response_format: JSON with detailed property information

content_summary.update_frequency: Regular updates with machine learning model improvements

research_notes.api_summary: HouseCanary provides comprehensive residential real estate analytics with excellent API design, Python SDK availability, and test API keys for development, making it highly accessible for developers.

name: Zillow API (Bridge Data Output)
description: Enterprise-focused real estate API providing Zestimate data and public records through Bridge Data Output platform with token-based authentication for institutional clients.

endpoints.description: Zillow's automated property valuation model data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with Zestimate values and confidence intervals

endpoints.description: Public property records and transaction history
endpoints.response_format: JSON with public records and transaction data

research_notes.api_summary: Zillow Bridge Data Output provides enterprise-focused access to Zestimate data and public records with token-based authentication designed for institutional clients and custom pricing.

name: Redfin API (Unofficial)
description: Community-driven unofficial API access to Redfin real estate data through reverse-engineered endpoints, offering free access but with ToS concerns and no official support.

access_info.pricing_model: Unofficial free access through community libraries
access_info.rate_limits: Unofficial - use responsibly to avoid blocking

endpoints.description: Property search through unofficial access
endpoints.response_format: JSON with property listings (unofficial)

content_summary.geographic_scope: US real estate markets covered by Redfin

research_notes.api_summary: Redfin offers unofficial free access through community libraries using reverse-engineered endpoints, though this approach has Terms of Service concerns and lacks official support.

name: ATTOM Data Solutions API
description: Industry-leading property data platform with 158+ million properties coverage, offering 30-day free trial with comprehensive documentation and extensive US market coverage (99% of population).

endpoints.description: Search properties with detailed information and market data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with comprehensive property details

endpoints.description: Market analytics and neighborhood data
endpoints.response_format: JSON with market analytics and trends

content_summary.update_frequency: Regular updates with comprehensive market coverage

research_notes.api_summary: ATTOM Data Solutions is the most accessible option with 30-day free trial, comprehensive documentation, and extensive property coverage (158+ million properties, 99% US population coverage).

name: CoStar API
description: Industry leader for commercial real estate data with partnership-only access, focusing on commercial properties, market analytics, and institutional clients with enterprise requirements.

access_info.pricing_model: Enterprise partnerships and custom pricing required

endpoints.description: Commercial property data and market intelligence
endpoints.response_format: JSON with commercial property details

endpoints.description: Commercial real estate market analysis and trends
endpoints.response_format: JSON with market analysis and commercial trends

research_notes.api_summary: CoStar is the industry leader for commercial real estate but requires enterprise partnerships with custom pricing, making it suitable only for institutional clients with significant commercial real estate needs.
